#summary ChangeLog
#labels Featured

= Introduction =
FindTBB does not have releases, but instead can be obtained directly from [http://code.google.com/p/findtbb/source/checkout SVN].
Consequently, instead of version numbers, revision numbers are referenced here.

= Changes =
*r24* (2011Feb10)<br />
Added compatibility with commercially aligned distribution for Mac OS X (thanks to Gino van den Bergen)

*r17* (2010May28)<br />
Added support for TBB 3.0 (thanks to Florian Uhlig)

*r15* (2009Apr24)<br />
Added support for the environment variable TBB_ARCH_PLATFORM (thanks to Gino van den Bergen)

*r2* (2009Jan21)<br />
Initial version
